Tensions between China and NBA are 'water under the bridge' - Nets ownerJoe Tsai, owner of the Brooklyn Nets basketball team, said the NBA is “in a very good place” in its relationship with China, four years after Beijing took games off air following remarks about the 2019 Hong Kong protests by a team executive. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 11:22:15 GMT WCEWQ57GGJNZBNXNVYGHTQHKHQ https://www.reuters.com/sports/basketball/tensions- Between-china-nba-are-water-under-bridge-nets-owner-2024-02-23/Josh Ye运动的篮球

BASF: Chinese imports into Europe are higher than everBASF said competition from Chinese rivals shipping their products into European chemical makers' home markets is at unprecedented levels and disruptions of the Red Sea transport route only have a temporarily dampening effect. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 10:51:47 GMT 6554QITUOBKS3N4K6AQXSA2EVU https://www.reuters.com/business/healthcare-pharmaceuticals/basf-chinese-imports-into-europe-are-higher-than-ever-2024-02-23/Reuters商业医疗保健与制药
China expected to take gradual approach to prop up economy further, say analystsChina is likely to persist with a gradual approach to stimulating its economy even as recent moves by its policymakers are unlikely to revive sentiment without further supply-side reforms and aggressive easing measures, market watchers said. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 10:02:16 GMT RJY2ARI3XRJ3LGHBY2Y2LOKJSI https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-expected-to-take-gradual-approach-prop-up-economy-further-say-analysts-2024-02-23/Anisha Sircar市场宏观问题
China says it aims to 'contain' foreign interference over Taiwan this yearChina aims to "contain" foreign interference over Taiwan and "resolutely combat" any efforts towards the island's formal independence this year, which is the sensitive 75th anniversary of the founding of communist China, state media said on Friday. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 09:31:36 GMT VL2C7LQXG5KIVN7YYMOINMVPTQ https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/china-says-it-aims-to-contain-foreign-interference-over-taiwan-this-year-2024-02-23/Reuters世界亚太地区
Tesla to fix software in 8,700 vehicles in China product recall, regulator saysChina's market regulator said on Friday that Tesla Inc would fix software in 8,700 vehicles to reduce the chance of accidents.
